title: cultural_data_National_Gallery,_London
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.macsoftex.ngl.
Application Name: National Gallery, London.
Number of Reviews: 9.00.
Application Description: Always dreamt to visit London, see Big Ben and walk round London National Gallery? We don’t know about the first two things, but the last one is quite easy to make true.“National Gallery, London HD” gives you a unique chance to enjoy the masterpieces of the world art without even standing up from your sofa. No matter whether you go by subway or stand in a traffic jam, with our application you will always have time to plunge into the world of Rubens, Tiziano and Rembrandt.KEY FEATURES - 1600 paintings of more than 500 masters of painting - Separation of paintings by genres and authors - Export paintings to Photo Album - Email paintings to your friends - Publication of paintings on Facebook - Convenient search for paintings - Adding paintings to My favorites - Download paintings for the offline viewing - Zoom of PaintingsRead moreCollapse.
Number of Characters in Description: 848.00.
Overall Rate: 3.30.
First Page Reviews: just images no text no useful to me great.
